code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useMultiplayer}from'../contexts/MultiplayerContext';import'./MultiplayerLeaderboard.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MultiplayerLeaderboard=()=>{const{leaderboard,onlinePlayers,isConnected}=useMultiplayer();const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const formatNumber=num=>{if(num>=1000000){return"\u20B9".concat((num/1000000).toFixed(1),"M");}else if(num>=1000){return"\u20B9".concat((num/1000).toFixed(1),"K");}return"\u20B9".concat(num.toLocaleString());};const getRankIcon=rank=>{switch(rank){case 1:return'ü•á';case 2:return'ü•à';case 3:return'ü•â';default:return"#".concat(rank);}};const getTotalValue=player=>{return player.credits+player.totalMargin;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"multiplayer-leaderboard ".concat(isOpen?'open':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"leaderboard-header",onClick:()=>setIsOpen(!isOpen),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"leaderboard-title",children:["\uD83C\uDFC6 Leaderboard ",isConnected?'üü¢':'üî¥']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"online-count",children:[onlinePlayers.length," online"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"leaderboard-toggle",children:isOpen?'‚àí':'+'})]}),isOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"leaderboard-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"leaderboard-tabs",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tab active",children:"Top Players"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"leaderboard-list",children:leaderboard.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"no-leaderboard",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No players yet. Be the first to join!"})}):leaderboard.map((player,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"leaderboard-item ".concat(player.isOnline?'online':'offline'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rank-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rank-icon",children:getRankIcon(index+1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"player-name",children:[player.username,player.isOnline&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"online-indicator",children:"\uD83D\uDFE2"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"player-stats",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stat-label",children:"Total Value:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stat-value total-value",children:formatNumber(getTotalValue(player))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stat-label",children:"Credits:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stat-value credits",children:formatNumber(player.credits)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stat-label",children:"Portfolio:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stat-value portfolio",children:formatNumber(player.totalMargin)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stat-label",children:"Profit:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"stat-value profit ".concat(player.profit>=0?'positive':'negative'),children:[player.profit>=0?'+':'',formatNumber(player.profit)]})]})]})]},player.username))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"leaderboard-footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"connection-status",children:isConnected?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"connected",children:"\uD83D\uDFE2 Connected to multiplayer"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"disconnected",children:"\uD83D\uDD34 Disconnected"})})})]})]});};export default MultiplayerLeaderboard;
